channel.title: I lag out after a choose a shop
channel.description: why is it every time i make a new shop on the base source project czar it always laggs out like i put in a different npc like i put in a brand new shop and i pt everything in correctly and when i press the trade button it laggs me out can anyone help i can never manage to add shops with project czar thanks

item.title: I lag out after a choose a shop
item.dc:creator: @Ixl_Adds_Ixl Ixl Adds Ixl
item.description:
@Ixl_Adds_Ixl wrote:

[quote=“Ncarug01, post:11, topic:182212”][quote author=Ixl Adds Ixl link=topic=243844.msg2060883#msg2060883 date=1203315608]
no, what needs to do is find a tutor on how to add shops. Look at ncp’s id causing the problem and add it as a shop.
[/quote]i know how to add shops correctly ive done it with fr33scape did the same method i usually do and its successful and everything same thing with gnarlyscape btu project czar is annoying[/quote]

well get the shops id and look it up in the client.java file. if its not in there thats your problem - you gotta add it in there. if it is then idk the problem…

Read full topic

item.title: I lag out after a choose a shop

item.description:
@Ncarug01 wrote:

ugh look that isnt it look i found the error in my runserver

java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -15 at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:17850) at client.packetProcess(client.java:16592) at client.packetSending(client.java:16561) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:138) at server.main(server.java:48) pimpscape Server [fatal] - exception

item.title: I lag out after a choose a shop
item.dc:creator: @Ixl_Adds_Ixl Ixl Adds Ixl
item.description:
@Ixl_Adds_Ixl wrote:

oh :o… I know what you mean. I just got confused when you used like one after another -.-:

Its logging you out because the shop isn’t actually inserted into the server. However you add shops using different ncps is how you fix that problem. Find the ncps digit and make it a shop for the users. Duh? Most people should know this and im not even a java programmer myself lol. Im just a web developer and designer…

Read full topic

item.title: I lag out after a choose a shop
item.dc:creator: @yppman yppman
item.description:
@yppman wrote:

Aye, silab does suck. Make sure you have ALL of the stuff right in the shop config file, and that you’re using tabs and not spaces, etc. Java’s bufferedreader is VERY picky about these things.

Read full topic
